patthana15.15:4.1: Hetuṃ micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.15:5.1: Hetuṃ sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.15:6.1: Nahetuṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
